requirements: Light up the map in the following zones: Bishui Plain, Qiongji Estuary, Minlin, Lisha, Sea of Clouds.
Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Liyue to their maximum level.
Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in Liyue.
Follow 20 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Follow 40 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Follow 60 Seelie in Liyue to their Seelie Courts (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Open 200 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Open 400 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Open 800 chests in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Complete 10 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Complete 20 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
Complete 40 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Liyue (The Chasm and Chenyu Vale are counted separately).
